name: One’s lose life -Welcome Home
description:
A survival game against ghosts that follow you.

1.How to play  

       How to play Is W, A, S, D or random lucky winner opens the door to find the key to exit the arrested room. and find the exit key to meet everyone which must be done according to the hunt of ghosts.

2.How to win    

         How to win Find the key according to the door color to get out of the house.

3.How to lose    

        How did you die If you can't escape from the chase of ghosts, three hearts will die.
